valid.instructions: Your completion of this form is a valuable step towards connecting individuals with resources in the Greater Knoxville area. To learn more about our services, please visit our <link>website</link>.

invalid.instructions: It seems the form link you have been provided is invalid. Please reach out to us via email at <email>respecialist@oconnorcenter.org</email> or by phone at <phone>(865) 523-1329</phone> to receive a valid link for your organization. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

preliminaries.title: Preliminaries
preliminaries.description: Let's get to know your agency...

address.mailing: Mailing Address (Only list if different from physical.)

serviceArea.title: Service Area
serviceArea.description: Choose the description that best reflects your service area.

agencyUpdate.title: Annual Agency Update
agencyUpdate.description: Provide a person we can contact for our annual information update.
agencyUpdate.name: Name
agencyUpdate.confidential: Would you like this information to be hidden from the website?

accessibility.title: Accessibility

languages.title: In addition to English, what languages are spoken by at lease on of your part-time staff?
languages.priorNotice: Can any languages be provided with prior notice? (Please list.)

accessibility.ada: Is your facility accessible to people with disabilities as defined by the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA)?

instructions.desktop: Add or select a service to begin.
instructions.mobile: Open the services list to begin.

contact.title: Contact Person
contact.description: Only add contact person if different from Director or if contact persons differ by service.

eligibility.title: Eligibility Requirements
eligibility.description: Who is eligible for this service? Who is the population the service is trying to serve? It is okay to restrict services to certain populations based on gender; family status, disability, age, personal situations, etc. (i.e. battered women with children, people with visual impairments, homeless men, etc.) This helps us to make appropriate referrals.

applicationProcess.title: Application Process
applicationProcess.description: How would someone apply for this service?

fees.title: Fees
fees.description: Are individuals charged for your services? What is your fee structure?

requiredDocuments.title: Required Documents
requiredDocuments.description: What would someone need to bring when applying?

eligibility.title: Who is eligible to volunteer?
eligibility.description: List type of volunteer work, age, training, background checks, and other requirements for your volunteers.

acceptDonations.title: Does your organization accept ongoing, non-monetary donations in support of programs or services?

list.title: Please list.
list.description: Example: pet food, clothing, appliances, furniture

other.title: Are there other agencies or services that have been helpful that you would recommend to be included in our resource database?
other.contactInformation: Please provide contact information for these agencies/services.

review.title: Review
review.description: Please review your selections and submit.

warnings.incomplete: Must have a label and number for each additional number.
warnings.duplicate: Cannot add duplicate labels or numbers.

servicesReview.noContact: Contact does not differ from agency directory or between services.

Complete.close: You can now safely close the page.

SignIn.quote: United Way of Greater Knoxville is driving change in our community by uniting people, businesses, and organizations. Together, we're creating a more equitable Knoxville where we have stable housing, financial security, quality early care and education, access to food, and more. Join us and answer the call.
SignIn.title: Sign in
SignIn.disclaimer: By signing in, you agree to our <tos>Terms of Service</tos> and <pp>Privacy Policy</pp>.
